chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Norine Dovarna, p. 64—Big-eyed, dreamy Aes Sedai of the White Ajah. She thinks that if the Keeper of the Chronicles is of the White Ajah, then she should be the Keeper of the Chronicles. She has few friends, perhaps none, even inside her own Ajah.
